abstract: The reorganization would reportedly put sales, engineering and manufacturing operations in North America under one executive.
snippet: The reorganization would reportedly put sales, engineering and manufacturing operations in North America under one executive.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The Toyota Motor Company is exploring a reorganization of its North American operations that would put its sales, engineering and manufacturing operations under one executive, people with direct knowledge of the plan said Thursday.

headline.main: Toyota Said to Weigh Reorganizing U.S. Operations
headline.print_headline: Toyota Said to Weigh Reorganizing U.S. Operations
